text: John Kennedy Sr. (29 December 1928 â€“ 25 June 2020) was an Australian rules footballer. He played for the Hawthorn Football Club, and coached Hawthorn and the North Melbourne Football Club in the Victorian Football League (VFL). He was born in Camberwell, Victoria. Kennedy Sr. died on 25 June 2020 at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers Category:Sportspeople from Victoria (Australia)
title: John Kennedy Sr. (footballer)
